pages.text: $(item)Vegetable Stinger$() is a Food item cooked in the $(pot)Advanced Crock Pot$(). It requires either a $(item)Toma Root$() or an $(item)Asparagus$(), a $(thing)Frozen$() item, and 1.5 additional $(thing)Vegetables$(). Because it requires 4 ingredients to make, there cannot be fillers. It takes 10 seconds to cook.
